skillTree.name: Brass-Lunged
skillTree.description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

skillTree.name: Sigmar’s Ward
skillTree.description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.

skillTree.name: Grim Resolve
skillTree.description: A Witch Hunter is a stern, grim figure, that can rarely be rattled despite the horrors he faces.

skillTree.name: Accusation
skillTree.description: The Witch Hunter levels his finger across the battlefield and accuses one of the enemy of arch-heresy!

target_if: Unit is not composed of a single entity

skillTree.name: Witch-Finder General
skillTree.description: The role of Witch-Finder General is the highest attainable office within the practices of legally authorised and sanctioned witch hunters operating openly in the Empire. Bearing such a writ gives a witch hunter leave to investigate the taint of Chaos anywhere within the Empire and act upon it should he find it.

skillTree.name: Blessed Relics
skillTree.description: The Witch Hunter keeps many blessed relics on his person to protect him against arcane attack.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic cost: +2 for all enemy spells
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.name: Tools of Judgement
skillTree.description: When attacking larger abominations, the Witch Hunter has the accoutrements to bring such beasts down.

skillTree.name: Seasoned Marksman
skillTree.description: Silent, swift and very, very deadly, this one can take down the foe from range without breaking a sweat or revealing his position.

skillTree.name: Destroy the Heart
skillTree.description: Through the skin to kill the soul.

skillTree.name: Locked & Loaded
skillTree.description: Only the foolish go on the hunt without supplies and a cast-iron plan.

skillTree.name: Sure & True
skillTree.description: Such advanced ballistic skills tend to rub off on one's subordinates.

ui_effects.description: Scaled projectile damage against combatants with missing health
Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Stalker
skillTree.description: "I spy with my beady eye… something that needs to be killed."

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Scavenge
skillTree.description: "I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Cleanse Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Vampire Hunter
backgroundSkills.description: Alberich von Korden is a Witch Hunter who is feared as well as respected in settlements across the Vale of Darkness.

effects.description:
Enables flaming attacks when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
	(all units in army)
Attribute: Unbreakable when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
Cooldown: -30% to "Focused Shot" and "Von Korden's Accusation"

items.name: White Ring of Templehof
items.description: A reward from the White Order of Templehof, who see Von Korden as a powerful force for good that can drive back the creatures of darkness.
